title: Mid-sourcing platform
fullText:
--- product: campaign title: Mid-sourcing platform description: Mid-sourcing platform feature: Workflows --- # Mid-sourcing platform{#mid-sourcing-platform} The workflow detailed below is installed with the **Mid-Sourcing platform** module by default. For more on this module, refer to this [section](../../installation/using/mid-sourcing-deployment.md).
Label
 Internal name
 Description
Delivery indicators
deliveryIndicators
This workflow updates delivery tracking indicators for a delivery. This workflow is triggered every hour by default.
